00027 class Object: public Function {
00028     public:
00030         typedef std::vector<unsigned> uintvec1D;
00032         typedef std::vector<uintvec1D> uintvec2D;
00033 
00034         Object (const QString &, unsigned, unsigned);
00035         virtual ~Object () { }
00036         virtual void ReInit (double, double, double,
00037                              double, double, double,
00038                              double, double, double);
00039 
00040         virtual void Transform (double Rxy, double Rxz, double Rxw,
00041                                 double Ryz, double Ryw, double Rzw,
00042                                 double Tx, double Ty, double Tz, double Tw);
00043         virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00044         virtual void Draw (void);
00045 
00046     protected:
00048         unsigned NumVertices;
00050         unsigned NumSurfaces;
00051 
00052         vec4vec1D X;        
00053         vec4vec1D Xtrans;   
00054         vec3vec1D Xscr;     
00055 
00058         floatvec1D R;
00061         floatvec1D G;
00064         floatvec1D B;
00065 
00067         uintvec2D Surface;
00068 
00073         virtual VecMath::Vector<4> &f (double, double, double) { return F; }
00074 };

00081 class Hypercube: public Object {
00082 public:
00083     Hypercube (): Object ("Hypercube", 16, 24) {
00084         parameterNames.push_back("Size");
00085     }
00086     Hypercube (double _a, const VecMath::Vector<4> &_Center = VecMath::Vector<4>(0., 0., 0., 0.));
00087     virtual ~Hypercube() { }
00088 
00089     virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double = 0, double = 0, double = 0) {
00090         a = _a; }
00091 
00092     virtual std::string description () {
00093         std::ostringstream out;
00094         out << "Hypercube (a = " << a << ")" << std::ends;
00095         return out.str ();
00096     }
00097 protected:
00098     virtual void Initialize();
00099     void DeclareSquare (unsigned, unsigned, unsigned, unsigned, unsigned);
00100 
00101     double a;
00102     VecMath::Vector<4> center;
00103 };

00126 class Sponge: public Hypercube {
00127 public:
00129 
00139     Sponge (unsigned _level = 1, int _distance = 1, double _rad = 1,
00140             VecMath::Vector<4> _center = VecMath::Vector<4>(0., 0.,0., 0.));
00141     virtual ~Sponge ();
00142 
00143     virtual void Transform (double Rxy, double Rxz, double Rxw,
00144                             double Ryz, double Ryw, double Rzw,
00145                             double Tx, double Ty, double Tz, double Tw);
00146     virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00147     virtual void Draw (void);
00148 
00152     virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double _b = 0, double _c = 0,
00153                                 double = 0) {
00154         Level = (unsigned)_a;
00155         distance = (int)_b;
00156         rad = _c;
00157     }
00158 
00160     virtual void ReInit (double, double, double,
00161                          double, double, double,
00162                          double, double, double) {
00163         List.clear();
00164         Object::ReInit(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0);
00165     }
00166 
00168     virtual std::string description () {
00169         std::ostringstream out;
00170         out << "Sponge (level = " << Level << ")" << std::ends;
00171         return out.str ();
00172     }
00173 
00174 protected:
00175     virtual void Initialize();
00176     virtual unsigned long MemRequired (unsigned);
00177     unsigned Level;                 
00178 
00180 
00181     std::vector<Hypercube *> List;
00182 
00183     int distance;                   
00184     double rad;                     
00185     VecMath::Vector<4> center;      
00186 };

00224 class Gasket: public Pyramid {
00225     public:
00226         Gasket (unsigned level = 1, double rad = 1,
00227                 VecMath::Vector<4> Center = VecMath::Vector<4> (0., 0.,0., 0.));
00228         virtual ~Gasket() { }
00229 
00230         virtual void Transform (double Rxy, double Rxz, double Rxw,
00231                                 double Ryz, double Ryw, double Rzw,
00232                                 double Tx, double Ty, double Tz, double Tw);
00233         virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00234         virtual void Draw (void);
00235         virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double _b = 0,
00236                                     double = 0, double = 0) {
00237             Level = (unsigned)_a;
00238             rad = _b;
00239         }
00240         virtual void ReInit (double, double, double,
00241                              double, double, double,
00242                              double, double, double) {
00243             List.clear();
00244             Object::ReInit(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0);
00245         }
00246 
00247     protected:
00248         virtual void Initialize();
00249         virtual unsigned long MemRequired (void);
00250         unsigned Level;
00251         std::vector<Pyramid *> List;
00252         double rad;
00253         VecMath::Vector<4> center;
00254 };
